content.en: Automated kidney analysis: Scientists are exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to improve the analysis of kidney biopsies. These algorithms can accurately identify and classify various features of kidney tissue, such as glomeruli and pathological lesions. By automating and standardizing the analysis process, these algorithms have the potential to provide more accurate diagnoses and prognoses for kidney diseases.
content.da: Automatiseret nyreanalyse: Forskere undersøger brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer for at forbedre analysen af nyrebiopsier. Disse algoritmer kan præcist identificere og klassificere forskellige træk ved nyrevæv, såsom glomeruli og patologiske læsioner. Ved at automatisere og standardisere analyseprocessen har disse algoritmer potentialet til at give mere præcise diagnoser og prognoser for nyresygdomme.
